North hands (Practice Page)

Equal Level Conversion. East opens 1 or 2 of a major. South has 4 of the other major and 5 or 6!D.

Board: 1
Dealer: E
Vul: None
HCP: 11		 ♠ 754
♥ A4
♦ A42
♣ K10974
East Opens 1♠.
West Bids 3♠ if possible.
East Doubles 4♣ if possible.

Partner bids first.

Vul: NS

East Bids 4♥ if possible.

1♠2♦Pass3NT
AP
